MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_250: 4-Organizer discovers files, analyzes them, and understands which folder to move them to. If your computer is full of files, they live where they want, get lost all the time and finding them is a problem... you need: 4-Organizer.
Site.Site_Description_450: Unique program for unique people - 4-Organizer. 4-Organizer is the only program that can sort files! Like your buddy, 4-Organizer discovers files, analyzes them, and understands which folder to move them to. If your computer is full of files, they live where they want, get lost all the time and finding them is a problem... you need: 4-Organizer.

Permissions.EULA:
End-User License Agreement (EULA) of 4-Organizer
This End-User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you and American Best Technologies Company LLC This EULA agreement governs your acquisition and use of our 4-Organizer software ("Software") directly from American Best Technologies Company LLC or indirectly through an American Best Technologies Company LLC authorized reseller or distributor (a "Reseller"). Please read this EULA agreement carefully before completing the installation process and using the 4-Organizer software. It provides a license to use the 4-Organizer software and contains warranty information and liability disclaimers. By clicking "accept" or installing and/or using the 4-Organizer software, you are confirming your acceptance of the Software and agreeing to become bound by the terms of this EULA agreement. If you are entering into this EULA agreement on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity and its affiliates to these terms and conditions. If you do not have such authority or if you do not agree with the terms and conditions of this EULA agreement, do not install or use the Software, and you must not accept this EULA agreement. This EULA agreement shall apply only to the Software supplied by American Best Technologies Company LLC herewith regardless of whether other software is referred to or described herein. The terms also apply to any American Best Technologies Company LLC updates, supplements, Internet-based services, and support services for the Software, unless other terms accompany those items on delivery. If so, those terms apply. This EULA was created by EULA Template for 4-Organizer. License Grant American Best Technologies Company LLC hereby grants you a personal, non-transferable, non-exclusive license to use the 4-Organizer software on your devices in accordance with the terms of this EULA agreement. You are permitted to load the 4-Organizer software (for example a PC, laptop, mobile or tablet) under your control. You are responsible for ensuring your device meets the minimum requirements of the 4-Organizer software. You are not permitted to: Edit, alter, modify, adapt, translate or otherwise change the whole or any part of the Software nor permit the whole or any part of the Software to be combined with or become incorporated in any other software, nor decompile, disassemble or reverse engineer the Software or attempt to do any such things Reproduce, copy, distribute, share for free, resell or otherwise use the Software for any commercial purpose or noncommercial purpose. Allow any third party to use the Software on behalf of or for the benefit of any third party Use the Software in any way which breaches any applicable local, national or international law Use the Software for any purpose that American Best Technologies Company LLC considers is a breach of this EULA agreement. Intellectual Property and Ownership American Best Technologies Company LLC shall at all times retain ownership of the Software as originally downloaded by you and all subsequent downloads of the Software by you. The Software (and the copyright, and other intellectual property rights of whatever nature in the Software, including any modifications made thereto) are and shall remain the property of American Best Technologies Company LLC. American Best Technologies Company LLC reserves the right to grant licenses to use the Software to third parties. Termination This EULA agreement is effective from the date you first use the Software and shall continue until terminated. You may terminate it at any time upon written notice to American Best Technologies Company LLC. It will also terminate immediately if you fail to comply with any term of this EULA agreement. Upon such termination, the licenses granted by this EULA agreement will immediately terminate and you agree to stop all access and use of the Software. The provisions that by their nature continue and survive will survive any termination of this EULA agreement. Governing Law This EULA agreement, and any dispute arising out of or in connection with this EULA agreement, shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of us.
Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: The 4-Organizer cannot be distributed over the internet in any form.

Press_Release.Headline: A new version of 4-Organizer is ready!
Press_Release.Summary: The information on the new version of the 4-Organizer.

English.Char_Desc_2000:
Unique program for unique people - 4-Organizer
4-Organizer is the only program that can sort files! Like your buddy, 4-Organizer discovers files, analyzes them, and understands which folder to move them to. If your computer is full of files, they live where they want, get lost all the time and finding them is a problem... you need: 4-Organizer.
For example: "my favorite song.mp3" -> Music "report_2021_quartetly.doc" -> Text document "img_20210428.jpg" -> Image
features sorting files speeding-up your PC removing unwanted/trash files cleaning hard drive removing cache and errors speeding-up browsers removing privacy vulnerabilities from browsers removing empty folders
More information: http://www.4organizer.com/main/
